channel.title: Testimonials on Ura Design
channel.description: Recent content in Testimonials on Ura Design
channel.copyright: Some rights reserved. Unless otherwise noted, content on this page is under a Creative Commons license.

item.description: “Ura understood the needs of the open-source community when we worked on a styleguide for the Tor Project, delivering a polished result.”
“The folks at Ura were very professional in learning our expectations, planning the project, and being flexible as things changed.”
“We loved working with Ura for Oxidize. From research over design to implementation, everything worked great.”

“From conception to execution, Ura was highly effective to gather requirements and deliver upon them without surprises. Their open design process and their professionalism in all phases of the project is something our team always appreciated.”
